page.title: 05Droitwich-Church & Religion
page.content: There are 5 Anglican churches,1 Roman Catholic,1 Baptist and 1 Methodist in the area. An estimated 2% of the population of Droitwich are committed Christians and regular worshippers. The 5 Anglican churches operate under a team vicar,but each have their own priest-in-charge.All are linked with the Droitwich Council of Churches.The team vicar has this to say: 'The Church in Droitwich continues to bear witness to the faith in Jesus Christ and in the light of this faith to serve the community.The parishes here have united to fom 1 parish,but the aim remains the same.' The most famous people associated with Droitwich have all been linked with the church:St. Richard the town's patron-saint,Edward Winslow the pilgrim father and John Corbett.
